text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Why are House Democrats Unconcerned By Covid-19 Crisis? What do they know? Just Business As Usual, weaponizing the crisis against our republic; disinformation. Siding with CCP. Their media echos CCP China propaganda. What gives?
